Subskills.name: Corrosive Force
Subskills.description: Increases damage dealt by noxious strike.

Subskills.name: Touch of Noxus
Subskills.description: Increases poisoned damage inflicted by noxious strike.

Subskills.name: Spinning Speartips
Subskills.description: Throw multiple spears on your third attack in an arc. The spears start spinning when hitting the ground dealing area of effect damage for a short period.

Subskills.name: Empowered Toxins
Subskills.description: Increases damage dealt to poisoned targets.

Subskills.name: Noxious Bolts
Subskills.description: Increases projectile count on your third attack.

Subskills.name: Noxian Slash
Subskills.description: Increases the damage and area of effect of your third attack.

Subskills.name: Corrosive Reach
Subskills.description: Increased attack damage and attack range while wielding a polearm.

Subskills.name: Envenoming Empowerment
Subskills.description: Killing a monster with noxious strike grants you a burst of movement speed.

Subskills.name: Noxious Sequence
Subskills.description: Perform additional spin attacks after the third one.

Subskills.name: Glimmering Venom
Subskills.description: Increases poison damage dealt by noxious strike.

Subskills.name: Crushing Corrosion
Subskills.description: Chance to inflict poison break on hit.

Subskills.name: Noxious Duality
Subskills.description: Chance on attack to perform an additional noxious strike.

Subskills.name: Explosive Toxins
Subskills.description: Poison projectiles explode on hit, dissolving into an acidic pool inflicting poison break and dealing additional damage. Acidic pool area of effect radius is increased based on your dexterity.

Subskills.name: Elemental Fragmentation
Subskills.description: Increases damage dealt by noxious strike and inflicts stacking elemental break on hit.
